014package org.microbean.construct.vm;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.List;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
021
022import java.lang.invoke.TypeDescriptor;
023
024import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
025import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
026import javax.lang.model.type.ExecutableType;
027import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
028
029import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
030
031import org.microbean.construct.Domain;
032
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_boolean;
034import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_byte;
035import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_char;
036import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_double;
037import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_float;
038import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_int;
039import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_long;
040import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_short;
041import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_void;
042
043/**
044 * A utility class that provides {@link TypeDescriptor}s for {@link TypeMirror}s.
045 *
046 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
047 *
048 * @see #typeDescriptor(TypeMirror, Domain)
049 *
050 * @see TypeDescriptor#descriptorString()
051 *
052 * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jvms/se23/html/jvms-4.html#jvms-4.3 Java Virtual Machine Specification,
053 * section 4.3
054 */
055public final class TypeDescriptors {
056
057  private static final ClassDesc[] EMPTY_CLASSDESC_ARRAY = new ClassDesc[0];
058
059  private TypeDescriptors() {
060    super();
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Returns a {@link TypeDescriptor} for the supplied {@link TypeMirror}, or {@code null} if there is no such {@link
065   * TypeDescriptor}
066   *
067   * @param t a {@link TypeMirror}; must not be {@code null}; must {@linkplain
068   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror#getKind() have a <code>TypeKind</code>} that is either {@link
069   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#ARRAY}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#BOOLEAN}, {@link
070   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#BYTE}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#CHAR}, {@link
071   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DECLARED}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#DOUBLE}, {@link
072   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#EXECUTABLE}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#FLOAT}, {@link
073   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#INT}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#LONG}, {@link
074   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#SHORT}, {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#TYPEVAR}, or {@link
075   * javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind#VOID} for a non-{@code null} {@link TypeDescriptor} to be returned
076   *
077   * @param d a {@link Domain}; must not be {@code null}
078   *
079   * @return a {@link TypeDescriptor}, or {@code null}
080   *
081   * @see TypeDescriptor#descriptorString()
082   *
083   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
084   */
085  @SuppressWarnings("try")
086  public static final TypeDescriptor typeDescriptor(final TypeMirror t, final Domain d) {
087    try (var lock = d.lock()) {
088      return typeDescriptor0(t, d);
089    }
090  }
091
092  private static final TypeDescriptor typeDescriptor0(final TypeMirror t, final Domain d) {
093    // Precondition: under domain lock
094    return switch (t.getKind()) {
095    case ARRAY -> typeDescriptor0(((ArrayType)t).getComponentType(), d); // recursive
096    case BOOLEAN -> CD_boolean;
097    case BYTE -> CD_byte;
098    case CHAR -> CD_char;
099    case DECLARED -> ClassDesc.of(d.toString(d.binaryName((TypeElement)((DeclaredType)t).asElement())));
100    case DOUBLE -> CD_double;
101    case EXECUTABLE -> {
102      final ExecutableType et = (ExecutableType)t;
103      final List<? extends TypeMirror> pts = et.getParameterTypes();
104      if (pts.isEmpty()) {
105        yield MethodTypeDesc.of((ClassDesc)typeDescriptor0(et.getReturnType(), d), EMPTY_CLASSDESC_ARRAY);
106      }
107      final List<ClassDesc> ptcds = new ArrayList<>(pts.size());
108      for (final TypeMirror pt : pts) {
109        ptcds.add((ClassDesc)typeDescriptor0(pt, d)); // recursive
110      }
111      yield MethodTypeDesc.of((ClassDesc)typeDescriptor0(et.getReturnType(), d), ptcds); // recursive
112    }
113    case FLOAT -> CD_float;
114    case INT -> CD_int;
115    case LONG -> CD_long;
116    case SHORT -> CD_short;
117    case TYPEVAR -> typeDescriptor0(d.erasure(t), d); // recursive
118    case VOID -> CD_void;
119    case ERROR, INTERSECTION, MODULE, NONE, NULL, OTHER, PACKAGE, UNION, WILDCARD -> null;
120    };
121  }
122
123}
